scripts.integration: bun run integration:clean; bun run integration:up && bun run integration:setup
scripts.integration:up: bun run test-integration/scripts/create-test-epub.ts && docker compose -f test-integration/docker-compose.yml up -d
scripts.integration:clean: docker compose -f test-integration/docker-compose.yml down -v; rm -rf test-integration/config test-integration/.env.test test-integration/books
scripts.integration:stress: bun run integration:stress:up && bun run integration:stress:setup
scripts.integration:stress:up: bun run test-integration/scripts/create-test-epub.ts && bun run test-integration/scripts/create-stress-epub.ts && docker compose -f test-integration/docker-compose.yml up -d
